price: 88. Zij zullen daarin verblijven. Noch zal hun bestraffing verlicht worden noch zal het vertraagd of uitgesteld worden.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunẓarūna
